name: Train Simulator (itch)
description:
Train simulator except it is a bus because I couldn't find a good train model xD. 

Features
  • SET the number of stations you want when you start the game.
  • Click on the STOP HERE buttons on top of each station to call the train to that station.
  • RELOAD the game if you want to set the number of stations again.
